channel.title: Running One-Shots: Gauntlet Podcast
channel.description:
On the Gauntlet Podcast I offer advice, tips, strategies, and example structures for running one-shot ttrpg sessions. We cover pitches, prep, safety, character creation, and much more.
Find that here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/running-one-shots
**Seminar Outline**
1. Pitches 2. Prep and setting up the materials 3. Session start 4. Keeping character creation tight 5. Teaching rules 6. Structure 7. Pacing 8. Safety 9. What makes a one-shot work (or not work) 10. Wrapping up
